Uses of Interface
com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image.Transformable

  • Packages that use Transformable 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.canvas  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection  

    • Uses of Transformable in com.defano.jmonet.canvas

      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.canvas that implement Transformable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JMonetCanvas
      A paint canvas with a built-in undo and redo buffer.

    • Uses of Transformable in com.defano.jmonet.tools

      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.tools that implement Transformable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LassoTool
      Selection tool allowing the user to draw a free-form selection path on the canvas.
      class  SelectionTool
      A tool for drawing a rectangular selection on the canvas.

    • Uses of Transformable in com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection

      Subinterfaces of Transformable in com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TransformableImageSelection
      Represents a selection in which the pixels of the selected image can be transformed (i.e., change of brightness, opacity, etc.).
      interface  TransformableSelection
      Represents a selection that can be transformed using operations that affect both the pixels of the selected image (i.e., change of brightness or opacity) and/or the selection's shape and location (i.e., flip, rotate or translate).
